title: Mud Bud
summaries: The Mud Bud is a Hardmode, post-Plantera pet-summoning item that spawns Plantero, a miniature version of Plantera, to follow the player around. When the player is far enough away or in midair, Plantero flies towards them in a manner similar to Plantera's second form while emitting a trail of falling leaves that are affected by wind. The Mud Bud can be purchased from the Zoologist for 50 GC after defeating Plantera.
